6f40932f-f82b-4afb-9917-a0375ec1f8d9.name: install headless Chrome
6f40932f-f82b-4afb-9917-a0375ec1f8d9.description:
Install headless Chrome in EC2 RHEL 7.3 using yum
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/add-repositories.html
https://medium.com/@davidkadlec/installing-google-chrome-on-amazon-linux-ec2-d1cb6aa37f28
https://www.sitepoint.com/headless-chrome-node-js/

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/sh
sudo rm -f /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo touch /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo chmod 666 /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

sudo echo -e "[google-chrome]
name=google-chrome
baseurl=http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/rpm/stable/\$basearch
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo

sudo touch /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo
sudo chmod 666 /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "[CentOS-base]
name=CentOS-6 - Base
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=os
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "#released updates
[CentOS-updates]
name=CentOS-6 - Updates
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=updates
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6

" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo echo -e "#additional packages that may be useful
[CentOS-extras]
name=CentOS-6 - Extras
mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=6&arch=x86_64&repo=extras
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=http://mirror.centos.org/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-6
" >> /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo yum install -y google-chrome-stable
sudo chmod 600 /etc/yum.repos.d/google-chrome.repo
sudo chmod 600 /etc/yum.repos.d/centos.repo

sudo yum -y install gnu-free-sans-fonts

google-chrome-stable --version

Will npm install a supplied package only if not already found in node_modules .
Login account must have sudo access.
Use -g to install globally.
Usage: npmInstall packagename [-g]
3ff8c413-a9fa-46d5-8cf1-90743d756b67.name: npmInstall.sh

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/bash
return_=0
# set to 0 if found
ls node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
ls /usr/lib/node_modules | grep $1 >/dev/null 2>&1 && { return_=1; }
  if [ "$return_" -eq 1 ]; then
    echo Found
  else
    echo Not found
    sudo npm install $1 $2 --save#!/bin/bash
    sleep 3
  fi
echo done

463949ca-9c9d-478a-b6d2-b0ac1376c1b8.name: createNewJSON.sh

tempArr.c:
#!/bin/sh

file=$1

if [ ! -e "$file" ] ; then
    touch "$file"
    echo $2 >> $file
fi

if [ ! -w "$file" ] ; then
    echo cannot write to $file
    exit 1
fi

Build and execute acme-client to retrieve cert, key & ca from letsencrypt. This will allow encrypted and ca verified https communication.

Only challenge type 'http-01' is implemented.

Change

.

3 files are generated;
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.key  
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.cert
/home/%systemUser%/.ssl/%hostName%.csr 

After the files are generated you can enable https and redirect to https

14cd0f02-ecee-4ecb-b0fa-a5600ded4108.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert new saveFileName
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%saveFileName%' <%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%c.jsonVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo -e '\n//<%a.add_inits%>' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into currentHtmlInsert
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.add_inits%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

echo 'var:dataStoreVar:<%c.jsonVar%>'
echo 'var:dataStoreFile:<%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%>'

#Create datastore file if it does not exist
if [ ! -e <%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%> ]; then
setPromptCodes:3e 20
   echo '{}' > <%a.projectPath%>/<%c.saveFileName%>;
   echo 'New data store created'
else
   echo 'Existing data store file found'
fi
setPrompt:[SysStack]

eb244935-024b-41d2-b4cd-eefb638a97f6.name: Hello World Data Store Get (/helloworldGet)
eb244935-024b-41d2-b4cd-eefb638a97f6.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123
eb244935-024b-41d2-b4cd-eefb638a97f6.script:
rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert jsonVar
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%jsonVar%' <%p.dataStoreVar%> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

#insert service End Point name
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serviceEndPointName%' <%c.serviceEndPointName%>  <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt
echo var:ezDataGetServiceEndPointName:<%c.serviceEndPointName%>

#add currentHtmlInsert point to end of template
echo -e '\n<!-- <%a.insertServices%>  -->' >> <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt 

#insert updated template into server file
<%s.Replace file line with file%> '<%a.insertServices%>' <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt <%a.serverPathFile%> 

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/myTemp.txt

5ab3adc1-8569-45ab-ab04-93b5dcad410e.description:
Calls sudo forever start to start the node process.

added to crontab manually:
 sudo crontab -u ec2-user -e
@reboot /home/ec2-user/projects/HelloWorld/restartServer.sh
5ab3adc1-8569-45ab-ab04-93b5dcad410e.name: re/start node
5ab3adc1-8569-45ab-ab04-93b5dcad410e.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%a.nodeFileName%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%a.projectPath%> <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%a.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

Form tag

   <!--insert%newID%-->
</form>

saveTemplate:<%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>
<%s.waitFor%> <%p.projectPath%>/<%c.nodeFileName%>

export serverPath=<%p.projectPath%>

echo var:nodeFileName:<%c.nodeFileName%>

cd $serverPath
#npm install express --save
<%s.npmInstall%> express

echo 'var:add_inits:<add_inits>'
echo 'var:add_functions:<add_functions>'

echo var:staticPath:<%p.projectPath%>/static

@reboot /home/SysStackUser/projects/proto/restartServer.sh

d93c3f0a-ec50-435f-9df5-11e28bf78f1c.script:
cd <%a.projectPath%> 

<%s.npmInstall%> forever -g

rm -f <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
saveTemplate:<%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%serverName%' <%c.server%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%projectPath%' <%s.projectPath%> <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh

chmod 770 <%s.projectPath%>/restartServer.sh
rm -f nohup.out
rm -f err.log

nohup ./restartServer.sh > restart.log &

d3c40aa8-942b-4920-82d7-636c006c2fea.script:
#Save service ejs 
rm -f <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
saveTemplate:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
<%s.waitFor%> <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

#use viewName for custom css & js file names
<%s.Replace file str with str%> '%viewName%' <%p.viewName%>  <%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs

echo var:servicePathFileName:<%s.viewsPath%>/<%p.viewName%>.ejs
echo var:insertDocReadyJS:%insertDocReady%
echo var:insertScriptJS:%insertScript%

echo var:insertJsSrc:%insertJsSrc%
echo var:insertCSSSrc:%insertCSSSrc%

echo var:customCSSFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

echo var:insertBodyHTML:%insertBodyHTML%

#create blank custom css file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS
export cssPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientCSS/<%p.viewName%>.css
rm -f $cssPath 
touch $cssPath 
echo '<!-- %customCSSInsert% -->' >> $cssPath 

echo var:customCSSInsert:%customCSSInsert%

#create blank custom JS file
mkdir <%s.staticPath%>/clientJs
export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js
rm -f $jsPath 
touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%

781b23f4-e1f7-4b25-a249-29b371ac1b62.name: FAQ Data Store Get - /faqGet

ops.insert:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

63f10982-7a16-41b6-8624-47ad46a503f2.name: CM Data Store Get (/cmGet)
63f10982-7a16-41b6-8624-47ad46a503f2.description:
Provides a simple service to get jason data from a data store.
Returns a row or all rows. 
Call service with 'id=#' to get all rows. Call with 'id=[id]' to get a specific row.
Eg: 
http://myNode/ezGet&id=#
   This will return all rows
http://myNode/ezGet&id=123
  This will return only row where id=123

echo var:customJsFileNamePath:<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

export jsPath=<%s.staticPath%>/clientJs/<%p.viewName%>.js

touch $jsPath 
echo '<!-- %customJsInsert% -->' >> $jsPath 

echo var:customJsInsert:%customJsInsert%
